chapter.title: Important Log Files
chapter.para: The most important files for this product are:

listitem.para: The &sapwiz; is a &yast; module. You can find its log entries in /var/log/YaST/y2log.
All &sap; knowledge is bundled in a library. You can find its log entries in /var/log/SAPmedia.log.
You can find log files related to auto-installation in /var/adm/autoinstall/logs.
